description: System-generated primary key uniquely identifying a craft/job classification record.
Business code or short identifier for the craft/job classification used on work orders, employee assignments, and reporting.
Human-readable title/description of the craft/job classification.
Free-text notes about the craft, policies, or usage; optional.
Estimated hourly pay rate for this craft for budgeting or labor cost calculations; currency/decimal.
Tax or burden rate applied to this craftâ€™s labor cost (likely a percentage or code; confirm with SME).
System timestamp when this craft record was last updated.
Audit field for last user modification; appears to store a timestamp (not a user ID). Confirm with SME.
User identifier that created this craft record (audit).
Timestamp when this craft record was created (audit).
User identifier that last modified this craft record (audit).
Timestamp when a user last modified this craft record (audit).
